channel.title: [317][DELTA] PM: When Player Logs in & Out it always says Logged In
channel.description:
Ok, so when a player you have in your friend list, Lets say for example Bob, when he logs in I get a message:
Bob has logged in
But when he logs out I also get the message
Bob has logged in
Does anyone know how to change that to Bob has logged out?

item.title: [317][DELTA] PM: When Player Logs in & Out it always says Logged In
item.dc:creator: @aekramer aekramer
